channel.title: Item prices?
channel.description: hello, i have a two questions that i need answered. i slightly remember how to change the price of an item, but i need reminding. what is the number that im supposed to multiply by to get the number to put in the items file? second, where do i put this new number? if you dont feel like explaining all of this to me then i would appreciate a tutorial that has already been made, just post a link. thanks guys. :cool:[br][size=1]Posted on: June 11, 2007, 04:55:59 PM[/size][hr]anyone know? i would really appreciate it.

item.title: Item prices?
item.dc:creator: @scratch scratch
item.description:
@scratch wrote:

thats right! that was the number i was lookin for. thanks man, see i had done this kinda stuff about 5 months ago and i couldnt remember that pesky number
